ComicInfo.Summary: ...and Who Shall Claim This Earth His Own? The Inheritor!: Project Greenskin proves to be a success as it is able to contain the Hulk until he once again reverts to Bruce Banner. Bruce uses the state-of-the-art labs housed within the complex to begin work on a new cure for his monstrous condition but his scientific studies are interrupted by a highly evolved cockroach bent on world domination.
ComicInfo.Tags: Thunderbolt Ross,Hulk,New Mexico,High Evolutionary,Inheritor,Hulkbusters,United States Army,Project Greenskin Base,Betty Ross,Glenn Talbot
ComicInfo.Title: ...and Who Shall Claim This Earth His Own? The Inheritor!
